problems.title: Create a Min Heap and Print Final Heap
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given N integers. Create a Min Heap by inserting values one by one.
To maintain the min heap property, use upward heapify after each insertion.
Finally, print the complete heap array in a single line separated by spaces.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
10 20 5 6 1

Sample Output
1 5 10 20 6

Explanation:
Min heap after inserting all elements becomes level-wise representation: 1 5 10 20 6

starterCodes.code:
class Solution:
    def insertHeap(self, heap, value):
        # TODO: Insert and apply upward heapify
        pass

if __name__ == '__main__':
    import sys
    data = sys.stdin.read().strip().split()
    N = int(data[0])
    values = list(map(int, data[1:]))
    heap = []
    sol = Solution()
    for v in values:
        sol.insertHeap(heap, v)
    print(*heap)

hintsList: Insert at the end then compare with parent while parent is larger.
